title: Purple Sun
description: Twelve-year-old Serena was once a regular girl. She hated school, loved swimming, and did all the normal things other kids did. Until her dreams started. And became a part of her reality. The dreams involved her parents. They changed her days and terrorized her nights. And when everyone's lives depended on the outcome of her dreams, Serena knew she needed to have a plan...
author: Diana Adams
